mapper.select: select * from reservation r, user u where r.user_id = u.user_id and email = #{email} order by reservation_date
mapper.insert: insert into reservation(ask_type, ask_content, desired_date1, desired_date2, reservation_date, reservation_status, position, user_id, mento_id, plan_title) values(#{askType}, #{askContent}, #{desiredDate1} , #{desiredDate2}, #{reservationDate}, #{reservationStatus}, #{position}, #{userId}, #{mentoId}, #{planTitle})
